SELECT MENU_NUM, MENU_NAME, MENU_TYPE, MENU_PARENT, MENU_URL, MENU_ORDER FROM CODING_MENU A WHERE 1=1
AND MENU_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{menuName},'%')
AND MENU_TYPE= #{menuType}
AND MENU_PARENT IN( SELECT MENU_NUM FROM CODING_MENU B WHERE A.MENU_PARENT = B.MENU_NUM WHERE B.MENU_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{menuName},'%') )
AND MENU_NUM IN ( SELECT MENU_NUM FROM CODING_MENU_USER B WHERE A.MENU_NUM = B.MENU_NUM WHERE B.LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName} )
ORDER BY MENU_ORDER
